mapper.select: SELECT `index` AS 'index', `region_code` AS 'regionCode', `name` AS 'name' FROM `terabox`.`theaters` WHERE `region_code` = #{regionCode}

SELECT `index` AS `index`, CASE WHEN `theaters`.region_code IN ('Dae', 'Gyeong', 'Bu') THEN 'Dae/Gyeong/Bu' WHEN `theaters`.region_code IN ('Daej', 'Chung', 'Sej') THEN 'Daej/Chung/Sej' WHEN `theaters`.`region_code` IN ('Gwang', 'Jeon') THEN 'Gwang/Jeon' ELSE region_code END AS 'regionCodeTwo', `name` AS `name` FROM `terabox`.`theaters` ORDER BY theaters.`name`
